com.pilot.jword.view
Interface Fragmentable

All Known Implementing Classes:
CellFragment, CellView, JWordParagraphView, RowFragment, RowView, TableFragment, TableView
public interface Fragmentable

An interface for Views that can be divided info Fragments (possibly at page or column boundaries)

Method Summary
 Fragment createEntireFragment()
          Creates a whole physical view (fragment) of this logical view entirely
 Fragment createView()
          Creates an empty physical fragment of this logical view
 void getFragments(int minimumSpan, int initialSpan, int defaultSpan, FragmentCollection fragments)
          Divide this view along the Y_AXIS and add Fragments to the given collection
 

Method Detail

getFragments

void getFragments(int minimumSpan,
                  int initialSpan,
                  int defaultSpan,
                  FragmentCollection fragments)
Divide this view along the Y_AXIS and add Fragments to the given collection

Parameters:
minimumSpan - expresses the minimum allocated region for the first fragment, because of parents requirements
initialSpan - initial space available
defaultSpan - default space for second and later fragments
fragments - list of fragments. a collection to be filled by this method

createView

Fragment createView()
Creates an empty physical fragment of this logical view

Returns:
Fragment

createEntireFragment

Fragment createEntireFragment()
Creates a whole physical view (fragment) of this logical view entirely

Returns:
Fragment
